name: Poppin' Soda (manny_y)
description:
Made for VGDC at CSUF's Fall-ty Game Jam

Download the .zip for the surest way to play.

Use WASD to move the player, aim with mouth cursor, left click to fire!
Arcade shoot 'em up. Survive as long, get the highest score! Pick up different soda cans for different abilities.
